How to determine the sum of interior angle of a polygon given one exterior angle ex

\begin{array}{l}\nI=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} S=(n-2) 180^{\circ} \\\n51.43^{\circ} \mathrm{S}^{\circ}\n\end{array}[imath]I=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} S=(n-2) 180^{\circ} [/imath] [imath]51.43^{\circ} \mathrm{S}^{\circ}[/imath]
